name: API's and Fetch

images.description: API project rubric with point allocations: Completion (160 pts), GitHub (140 pts), Errors (70 pts), Video (30 pts)
API project assignment details and requirements

rubricDescription: This assignment requires students to create a CRUD application (CRUD without update) using json-server or another API. Students must use fetch and async/await to interact with the API, implement forms to create/post entities, include deletion functionality, and display fetched entities. The rubric evaluates completion (160 pts), GitHub repository setup (140 pts), errors/functionality (70 pts), and video explanation (30 pts), for a total of 400 possible points.
